クラス Present

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Present

public class Present
extends greenfoot.Actor

The (almost, but not quite fully) coded Present class allows for contruction, drawing, and "querying" of a Present.

バージョン:
11/2017
作成者:
Stephen Blythe

コンストラクタの概要
Present(int width, int height, greenfoot.Color col)
          Constructor for a Present
 
メソッドの概要
 void act()
          Act - whenever clicked, a present gets examined and a tooltip showing this Present's height, width, and number of peeks
 int getArea()
           
 greenfoot.Color getColor()
          getColor returns the wrapping paper color
 int getHeight()
          getHeight returns the height of the present
 int getPeeks()
          getPeeks returns the number of times this prent was examined
 int getWidth()
          getWidth returns the width of the present
 
クラス greenfoot.Actor から継承されたメソッド
addedToWorld, getImage, getIntersectingObjects, getNeighbours, getObjectsAtOffset, getObjectsInRange, getOneIntersectingObject, getOneObjectAtOffset, getRotation, getWorld, getWorldOfType, getX, getY, intersects, isAtEdge, isTouching, move, removeTouching, setImage, setImage, setLocation, setRotation, turn, turnTowards
 
クラス java.lang.Object から継承されたメソッド
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

               int height,

パラメータ:
width - - the width of the present
height - - the height of the present
col - - the color of the present
